title: Coconut Development Authority Chair resigns
content: Chairman of the Coconut Development Authority Keerthi Weerasingha resigns from the post. Weerasinghe has resigned from his position on the instructions of the President's Office following the attack on Ragama Medical Faculty students. He has handed over his resignation letter to the Minister in charge of the subject, Ramesh Pathirana. Earlier, MP Arundhika Fernando resigned as State Minister of Coconut, Kithul and Palmyrah Cultivation Promotion and Related Industrial Product Manufacturing & Export Diversification.
